biocontainers.name: mixcr
biocontainers.summary: MiXCR is a universal framework that processes big immunome data from raw sequences to quantitated clonotypes. MiXCR efficiently handles paired- and single-end reads, considers sequence quality, corrects PCR errors and identifies germline hypermutations. The software supports both partial- and full-length profiling and employs all available RNA or DNA information, including sequences upstream of V and downstream of J gene segments.

biotools.summary: Software for extraction of T- and B-cell receptor repertoires from any type of sequencing data.

bioschemas.name: MiXCR
bioschemas.summary: Software for extraction of T- and B-cell receptor repertoires from any type of sequencing data.
